  <history>Layer was downloaded as a shapefile by ITOS from a Dropbox link provided by the IMO. It was then analyzed by ITOS for errors. Those errors were corrected and the layer was sent back to UNOCHA as a feature class within a file geodatabase. The following errors were found and fixed by ITOS: 1. Projection changed to "GCS_WGS_1984" 2. Created and populated Admin0 name and p-code fields 3. Admin1 name "Akwa lbom" was not proper case and was mispelled with a lower case "L" instead of a capital "i". The error was fixed 4. Created and populated reference name field 5. Admin1 "Yobe" had a small multipart sliver error that was fixed 6. Fixed nesting errors with Admin0-2 7. Fixed 13 gap errors and 14 overlap errors</history>
